result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Damian Durrell Payne not in court, in custody.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn appeared by video for Damian Durrell Payne.  Prosecuting attorney M Samir Siddique in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for pretrial conference.  Defense acknowledges receipt of discovery and an offer.  Court sets a status date.  Case adjourned to Branch 30.
Status conference scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Letter from defendant.  (Damian Payne - #2022010465, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Home Depot, Wauwatosa; JJM
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.

Defendant Damian Durrell Payne appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Ashley Fard appeared by video for Damian Durrell Payne.  Attorney Katrina Voge appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
